entries.name: Gamedle
entries.description: Guess the video game in various ways.

entries.name: Smashdle
entries.description: A bunch of daily games where you guess the character from Super Smash Bros.

entries.name: Scrandle
entries.description: Guess which scran (stadium food) is more popular based on their pictures and prices.

entries.name: Pokedoku
entries.description: Fill out the grid with Pok√©mon matching the criteria of each cell's row and column.

entries.name: Guess the Game
entries.description: Guess the video game by its cropped screenshots.

entries.name: Zoom Out
entries.description: Guess the video game from the zoomed-in screenshot.

entries.name: OWDle
entries.description: Daily games related to Overwatch 2. Guess the character or guess the conversation between two characters.

entries.name: Daily Tens
entries.description: Guess the top 10 items of today's category.

entries.name: GuessTen
entries.description: Guess the top ten entries of today's category. (Daily Tens but slightly worse)

entries.name: List Them All
entries.description: List all of the items that fit today's category.

entries.name: Steamdle
entries.description: Guess the game based on the Steam review.

entries.name: Real Bird Fake Bird
entries.description: Guess if each of the 7 prompts are real or fake (made up or don't belong).

entries.name: Daily Fact or Fiction
entries.description: Guess whether today's statement is fact or fiction.

entries.name: Chrono
entries.description: Put the events in chronological order in 3 tries or less.

entries.name: FoodGuessr
entries.description: Guess what country each of the food dishes are from.

entries.name: More/Less
entries.description: Decide which option has more or less, and keep going until you get one wrong.

entries.name: Angle
entries.description: Guess the angle in 4 guesses or less.

entries.name: Guess the Angle
entries.description: Guess today's angle in 4 guesses or less. (Angle but slightly worse)

entries.name: Guess the House
entries.description: Guess the price of the house by its pictures and information.

entries.name: Housle
entries.description: Guess the price of the house, given pictures of parts of the house.

entries.name: Daily Dozen Trivia
entries.description: Answer 9 trivia questions from various categories. (Eat your vegetables)

entries.name: Heardle Daily
entries.description: Guess the song by listening to small parts of it.

entries.description: Guess the video game track from listening to small parts of it.
